text: Your company recently migrated several of is ML models to Google Cloud. You have started developing models in Vertex AI. You need to implement a system that tracks model artifacts and model lineage. You want to create a simple, effective solution that can also be reused for future models. What should you do?

choices.text: Use a combination of Vertex AI Pipelines and the Vertex AI SDK to integrate metadata tracking into the ML workflow.
Use Vertex AI Pipelines for model artifacts and MLflow for model lineage.
Use Vertex AI Experiments for model artifacts and use Vertex ML Metadata for model lineage.
Implement a scheduled metadata tracking solution using Cloud Composer and Cloud Run functions.
